name: GOLD IS MINE
description:
A gold hunter simulator. Here you can walk around the forest and enjoy the nature, meet different animals and, of course, gather gold.

Is a mushroom gold simulator. Here you can walk around the forest and enjoy the nature, meet different animals and, of course, gather gold. The goal of the game is not only to gather as many gold as possible but also to find the way back to the car without any modern equipment. Only best gold hunters are able to cope with this.

Main Game Features:
- look for gold,
- pick as many gold as you can,
- enjoy the nature,
- walk as long as you want,
- watch forest animals,
- find the way back.
